meanings.definition: a person who is enthusiastic about high-fidelity sound reproduction
meanings.sent1: The audiophile spent hours adjusting the speakers to get the perfect sound.
meanings.sent2: She became an audiophile after attending a concert with exceptional sound quality.
meanings.sent3: The audiophile's love for music was so strong that they could hear a pin drop in a noisy room.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to sound quality made him the audiophile king among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The audiophile's ears were finely tuned to detect even the slightest distortion in music.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of audiophiles
meanings.sent1: The store specialized in audiophile equipment for music enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: The audiophile community was excited about the new high-end headphones.
meanings.sent3: The audiophile party was filled with discussions about the best sound systems.
meanings.sent4: Her room had an audiophile vibe with speakers in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The audiophile magazine featured reviews of the latest audio gadgets.

meanings.definition: a group of audiophiles gathered to discuss the latest audio equipment
meanings.sent1: The audiophile club met every week to share their favorite music tracks.
meanings.sent2: At the convention, the audiophile group debated the merits of vinyl versus digital.
meanings.sent3: The audiophile gathering turned into a lively debate on the best headphones.
meanings.sent4: In the room, the audiophile crowd buzzed with excitement over the new speakers.
meanings.sent5: The audiophile meetup was a paradise for those who loved to talk about sound systems.
